delete_res_1: Do you really want to delete the reservation for
no_reservations: You do not have any open reservations at the moment
res_detail_1: You have a shopping slot at
reminder_snack: Reminder set 30 minutes before your reservation
slider_tips_1: Only stores with low utilization are shown (great for high-risk groups)
slider_tips_2: Stores with very high utilization are not shown
slider_tips_3: All stores are shown, even if utilization is high at the moment
